name: Glitching Pixels Like There’s No Tomorrow 1

metadata.name: Glitching Pixels Like There’s No Tomorrow 1
metadata.description:
Artist: Thomas Noya is a digital artist from Venezuela. Existing in the liminal space between arts and science, his work focuses on the use of organic data for the generation of digital images translating from the physical to the digital through an active collaboration with AI tools.

Description: Our planet is glitching, not just sociopolitically but ecologically.

Technique: The artwork is digitally created by using GANs, custom generative glitching algorithm, earth surface, and water data. - Digital Photography - GAN (styleGAN2-ada) - Generative Glitching Algorithm
